channel.title: Terraform on REDtalks.live
channel.description: Recent content in Terraform on REDtalks.live

item.title: KNOWN ISSUE: Error: configmaps "aws-auth" already exists
item.description: Documented at: 10/14/2022 Review by: 12/01/2023 Overview The following is a common error with AWS EKS Module v17.x: Error: configmaps "aws-auth" already exists Example module use: module "eks" { source = "terraform-aws-modules/eks/aws" version = "17.

item.title: #070 - Consul Terraform Sync - Under the Hood!
item.description: Following last weeks episode – #69 – Network Infrastructure Automation w/ Consul – we’re going to take a closer look at HashiCorp’s Consul Terraform Sync, and how it stitches together the observability of Consul with the unmatched Infrastructure as Code capabilities of Terraform.

item.title: #069 - Network Infrastructure Automation w/ Consul
item.description: Welcome to episode 69! In a previous episode on this theme – #68 – Avoiding DevOps Continuous Disappointment – we discussed the perils of ‘business value’ being stuck in job queues awaiting human interaction.
